entries.title: The First Heat Wave of the Year Is Baking the West
entries.description: Temperatures soared in California and the Southwest ahead of what could be a brutal summer.

entries.title: A Tribute to the Inane Dramas of Sideline Parents
entries.description: Who would have thought I’d miss all that groaning, whining and anguish?

entries.title: At D-Day Ceremony, Biden Warns Against Isolationism
entries.description: The president defended decades of trans-Atlantic security ties that are facing fresh conflicts and rising authoritarianism, as Western leaders marked the 80th anniversary of the allies landing in France.

entries.title: Executives and Officials Convene at WSJ Tech Live: Cybersecurity
entries.description: National security threats, the impact of AI and pig-butchering scams are on the agenda for the daylong event.

entries.title: SEC Cyber Disclosures Delayed Several Times Since December
entries.description: The U.S. government has delayed public disclosures of cyber incidents several times since new rules came into force last December, a senior Justice Department official said.

entries.title: Basic Materials Roundup: Market Talk
entries.description: Gain insight on Antofagasta, Iron-ore demand and more in the latest Market Talks covering Basic Materials.

entries.title: Energy & Utilities Roundup: Market Talk
entries.description: Find insights on voluntary output cuts by OPEC, Tenaga Nasional, and more in the latest Market Talks covering Energy and Utilities.

entries.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
entries.description: Find insights on Nvidia’s Ian Buck, artificial intelligence model architecture, D2L, and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

entries.title: Auto & Transport Roundup: Market Talk
entries.description: Gain insight on Transat, Stellantis, Renault and more in the latest Market Talks covering the Auto and Transport sector.

entries.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
entries.description: Gain insight on TD Bank, Ninety One, CIMB and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

entries.title: FTC Opens Antitrust Probe of Microsoft AI Deal
entries.description: The commission has sent subpoenas to the tech giant and an AI startup, asking whether their partnership evaded a government review.

entries.title: Chanel Creative Director to Leave in Latest Fashion Shake-Up
entries.description: Virginie Viard is set to leave the luxury brand, marking the departure of one of the few women to lead the artistic direction of a major fashion house.

entries.title: 'The Watchers' Review: All Eyes on a New Shyamalan
entries.description: Produced by M. Night Shyamalan, his daughter Ishana’s debut feature struggles to steer its intriguingly supernatural premise to a satisfying end.

entries.title: AI Siphons Copper Supplies Needed for Green Transition
entries.description: Electrification continues to drive demand for the eternal metal, but the focus is shifting from EVs to the data centers needed to power artificial intelligence.

entries.title: Demand for Workers Rises at Small Firms…
entries.description: .… but the latest NFIB survey finds flat employment as positions go unfilled.

entries.title: Hamas Leader Sinwar Holds Firm on Demands for Gaza Cease-Fire With Israel
entries.description: The group’s chief in Gaza issued his first response to a plan promoted by President Biden, as Palestinian officials accused Israel of killing dozens in an airstrike.

entries.title: How Much Is Mar-a-Lago Actually Worth? It's a Billion-Dollar Question.
entries.description: The answer isn’t straightforward, thanks to a preservation easement placed on former President Trump’s Palm Beach estate.

entries.title: What 13 Stylish Men Really Want for Father's Day
entries.description: These dads just want a nice watch, a cooking class and a new pair of shoes.

entries.title: Clean-Energy Investment This Year To Be Twice That of Fossil Fuels, IEA Says
entries.description: Spending on renewables, grids and storage is now higher than total investment in oil, gas and coal.

entries.title: ECB Cuts Interest Rates for First Time Since 2019
entries.description: The quarter-point rate cut potentially puts the ECB and the Fed on different tracks and widens an existing gap in borrowing costs between the U.S. and Europe.
